name: Sluggo Brand Neon Apple Snack Fruit Pie

system.description:
These snack pies come in a wide variety of flavors, but the most popular, by far, is the Neon Apple. When eaten, the skumdog gains an additional 2 HP. The radioactive properties of the pie leave the mouth glowing neon green for an hour afterwards. The 2 HP is permanent and added to the scumdogâ€™s Base HP.

The Sluggo Curse: If a skumdog eats more than 3 Pies, they become addicted and roll on the @UUID[Compendium.neon-lords.tables.RollTable.HyBQa4FGfKxwNOaw]{Minor Mutations Table}.
